Articles.Content: Hello there! I've been playing KSP for about three weeks (started just before .90 was released), and I must say that in my opinion this is the coolest game since computers were invented. I'm fumbling my way through career mode, trying to learn the finer points of Munar orbit insertion and orbital rendezvous...I've heard that Kerbal Engineer is a big help. The available versions I see say "Compatible with .25" - will they work with the beta version? Thanks in advance, and it's great to be here!

Welcome to the forums!

There are two current versions of Kerbal Engineer. Try the 1.0 Beta.
